intro: Rennellia, commonly known as the Rennell island tree, is a flowering plant native to the island of Rennell in the South Pacific. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its evergreen leaves and produces small, white flowers that are often clustered together. Its fruit is a capsule that contains numerous tiny seeds. Rennellia is of interest to botanists due to its unique ecological role and limited distribution.
